definition.created: The field definition has been created.

delete.confirm: To delete the field definition, enter its name in the field below.
delete.title: Delete Field Definition

definition.deleted: The field definition has been deleted.

help.description: This text is used to describe and provide indications about this field to the user.
help.displayName: This text is used as field label.
help.uniqueName: This text is used to identify the field.

indexed.help: When enabled, field values will be indexed into the database.
indexed.label: Indexed

invariant.help: When enabled, translation of this field values will be disabled.
invariant.label: Invariant

placeholder.help: This text is used into empty fields.
placeholder.label: Placeholder

required.help: When enabled, field values will be required to publish contents.
required.label: Required

unique.help: When enabled, field values must be unique for each content.
unique.label: Unique

definition.title: Fields
definition.updated: The field definition has been updated.

type.created: The field type has been created.

delete.confirm: To delete the field type, enter its name in the field below.
delete.title: Delete Field Type

type.deleted: The field type has been deleted.

select.help: The field type cannot be changed after field creation.
select.label: Type

type.title: Field Types
type.updated: The field type has been updated.
